alert.note: Alert for Washington (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 1:01AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Washington Parish, Walthall, northeastern Pike and Pearl River Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 101 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tylertown to Sandy Hook to near Rock Hill to near New Augusta. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mccomb, Bogalusa, Franklinton, Poplarville, Summit, Tylertown, Varnado, Salem, Crossroads, Dexter, Mcneil and Angie. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 17 and 23. Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 12 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for southern Mississippi.
